channel.title: Orange Juice on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Orange Juice on Need a drink?

item.title: Blood and sand
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml Scotch
  • 20 ml blood orange juice
  • 20 ml sweet vermouth
  • 20 ml cherry liqueur
  • (garnish) orange zest
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.
